CustomField.description: If this is unchecked, scheduled jobs will only run at the top of the hour (HH:00). If this is checked, scheduled jobs can be run at 5 minute intervals (HH:00, HH:05, HH:10, etc.).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If this is unchecked, scheduled jobs will only run at the top of the hour (HH:00). If this is checked, scheduled jobs can be run at 5 minute intervals (HH:00, HH:05, HH:10, etc.).
CustomField.label: Granular Scheduled Jobs
